name: discord-archive-system
description: Discord message archive system with React frontend and Discord bot

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:bot && npm run install:shared
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:bot"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:bot
